GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Responds with an array of all articles. Accepts queries for sorting.

queries.sort_by: column name to sort by, defaulys to 'created_at'

GET /api/users.description: serves up an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up an object of an article by its author_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Returns all comments for a given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a new comment to the specified article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the vote count for a specific article
